title: why did i get punished for doing the same thing as nightblue
body: yes yes this guy was trolling me too why did i get punished for afking and being toxic in game?

replies.body: You forgot to say in chat your riot friend will ban them, I think there is the mistake.
Because you're not part of the League Partner Program hehe xd

because your not friends with a biased rioter.
Send a support ticket with his video, showing how you did what he did and he gets paid for it so you should be rewarded too ^^
